item.description:
I am a Final Year Undergraduate at Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur majoring in Computer Science and Engineering. I am interested in the field of machine learning and distributed systems, and have been working on similar areas.

I have completed courses on Machine Learning, Operating Systems, Probabilistic Modeling, Compilers ,Computer Vision and Cybersecurity.

I have also worked at Nutanix Technologies, Bangalore as a Backend Developer during a two month internship and will be joining Nutanix as a full time Member of Technical Staff from August, 2020.
